section.heading: City of Hudson community development and planning agency

content.p:
ยง 640. City of Hudson community development and planning agency. An
urban renewal agency, to be known as the city of Hudson community
development and planning agency, is hereby established for the
accomplishment of any or all of the purposes specified in articles
fifteen and fifteen-A of this chapter and in accordance with article
eighteen of the constitution of the state of New York. It shall
constitute a body corporate and politic, and be perpetual in duration
and shall consist of five members, including the mayor, majority leader
of the common council, minority leader of the common council, chairman
of planning commission and chairman of the housing authority. It shall
have the powers and duties now or hereafter conferred by article
fifteen-A of this chapter upon municipal renewal agencies. It shall be
organized in the manner prescribed by and be subject to the provisions
of article fifteen-A of this chapter and the agency, its members,
officers and employees and its operations and activities shall in all
respects be governed by the provisions of such article.
